title: Humble Bitcoiners
author: Humble Bitcoiners
content: After checking the Bolt Ring webpage regularly over the last months i mentioned today that a few of them are available again. https://bitcoin-ring.com/products/bitcoin-boltring-contactless-nfc-lightning-paymentNot many...so hurry up and get this cool pieceGreets Humble üçÄ
